# Cure Moderate Wounds (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Adept Spells|Adept 2]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half (harmless); see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless); see text

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 263

This spell functions like *[[Cure Light Wounds (Spell)|cure light wounds]]*, except that it cures 2d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +10).
